page.title: 10THE RESERVOIR
page.content: {CAPACITY:}3 million gallons {REASON:}To irrigate the crops of potatoes and sugar beet during long dry summers {HOW IS WATER TAKEN FROM RESERVOIR:}It is pumped along flexible pipe to nearby fields {HOW IS WATER PUT INTO RESERVOIR:}A natural stream fills reservoir {WHY IS THERE A ISLAND IN THE MIDDLE:} Encourages growth of plants and allows water birds to nest and raise their young {DO YOU NEED PERMISSION FROM THE {DISTRICT COUNCIL TO BUILD THE {RESERVOIR:}Yes - because the land is being used for a different purpose {DO YOU NEED PERMISSION TO STORE WATER {AND USE IT FOR IRRIGATION:}Yes - from the Severn Trent Water Authority Emma Crush Age 10
